Package org.mitre.synthea.modules

Class WeightLossModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.synthea.engine.Module
      • org.mitre.synthea.modules.WeightLossModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    public final class WeightLossModule
extends Module
    This module allows patients in Synthea to lose weight. It will be triggered when patients hit a specified age and weight threshold. At that point, patients may chose to manage their weight. If they do, it will suspend any weight adjustments from the LifecycleModule. Patients will then lose weight based on adherence generated by this module. Given successful weight loss, the patients have the chance to later regain all of their weight (very likely given the default probabilities).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:

        time - The current simulation time.

        Parameters:
        person - The person undergoing weight management.
        time - The current simulation time.

      • stopWeightManagement

        public void stopWeightManagement​(Person person)
        Person stops weight management. The module will remove all weight management related attributes.
        Parameters:
        person - The person stopping weight management.

      • firstYearOfManagement

        public boolean firstYearOfManagement​(Person person,
                                     long time)
        Determines whether the person is currently within their first year of active weight management based on the WEIGHT_MANAGEMENT_START attribute.
        Parameters:
        person - The person undergoing weight management.
        time - The current simulation time.
        Returns:
        True if the person is in their first year of weight management, false otherwise.

      • firstFiveYearsOfManagement

        public boolean firstFiveYearsOfManagement​(Person person,
                                          long time)
        Determines whether the person is currently within their first five years of active weight management based on the WEIGHT_MANAGEMENT_START attribute.
        Parameters:
        person - The person undergoing weight management.
        time - The current simulation time.
        Returns:
        True if the person is in their first five years of weight management, false otherwise.

      • adultWeightLoss

        public double adultWeightLoss​(Person person,
                              long time)
        Weight loss is linear from the person's start weight to their target weight (start - percentage loss) over the first year of active weight management. Returns the new weight for the person.
        Parameters:
        person - The person undergoing weight management.
        time - The current simulation time.
        Returns:
        The new weight for the person.

      • adultRegression

        public double adultRegression​(Person person,
                              long time)
        Weight regression is linear from a person's current weight to their original weight over the second through fifth year of active weight management. Returns the new weight for the person.
        Parameters:
        person - The person undergoing weight management.
        time - The current simulation time.
        Returns:
        The new weight for the person.

      • pediatricRegression

        public void pediatricRegression​(Person person,
                                long time)
        This will regress a pediatric patient back to their BMI percentile. Weight gain will not necessarily be linear. It will approach the BMI based on percentile at age as a function of time in the regression period.
        Parameters:
        person - The pediatric patient undergoing weight management.
        time - The current simulation time.

      • transitionRegression

        public double transitionRegression​(Person person,
                                   long time)
        Revert the person to their 240 month weight percentile following the same procedure as pediatric regression.
        Parameters:
        person - The person undergoing weight management.
        time - The current simulation time.
        Returns:
        The new weight for the person.

      • adjustBMIVectorForSuccessfulManagement

        public void adjustBMIVectorForSuccessfulManagement​(Person person)
        Change the BMI vector to reflect successful management of weight. This will add a new point at the end of the trajectory that will result in the BMI percentile change selected for the person. The change will take place 12 months after the current tail of the trajectory. If that will take the person past 20 years old, the time frame will be cut short to end at 240 months of age.
        Parameters:
        person - to adjust the trajectory for

      • maintainBMIPercentile

        public void maintainBMIPercentile​(Person person,
                                  long time)
        For patients under 20 that have successful weight management and long term success, they will maintain their BMI until they reach age 20. This means that they will gain weight as they are gaining height, but it will be in a more healthy range.
        Parameters:
        person - The person undergoing weight management.
        time - The current simulation time.

      • startWeightManagement

        public void startWeightManagement​(Person person,
                                  long time)
        Starts active weight management for the person. It will select if a person adheres to their weight management plan. If they do, it will select the percentage of their body weight that they will lose and whether they will keep it off long term.
        Parameters:
        person - The person starting weight management.
        time - The current simulation time.

      • willStartWeightManagement

        public boolean willStartWeightManagement​(Person person,
                                         long time)
        Determines whether a person will start weight management. If they meet the weight management thresholds, there is a 49.3% chance that they will start weight management. This does not mean that they will adhere to the management plan.
        Parameters:
        person - The person being evaluated for weight management.
        time - The current simulation time.
        Returns:
        True if the person will start weight management, false otherwise.

      • meetsWeightManagementThresholds

        public boolean meetsWeightManagementThresholds​(Person person,
                                               long time)
        Determines whether a person meets the thresholds for starting weight management. With the default settings: Children under 5 do not ever meet the threshold. Patients from ages 5 to 20 meet the threshold if their BMI is at or over the 95th percentile for their age in months Patients 20 and older meet the threshold if their BMI is 30 or over.
        Parameters:
        person - The person being evaluated for weight management thresholds.
        time - The current simulation time.
        Returns:
        True if the person meets the thresholds for weight management, false otherwise.
